Description: Fragment of flattened handle to sharpish turn of a Rhodia pottery transport amphora. Clay fine pink-buff. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '316'. Name Ieron. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0044.26.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (163)
